Blog.post: every now and then, when i see pretty gals, i will like "i gonna get them" without knowing wat actually they are. so the phase "dont jugde a book by its cover" is so true. i read some gals web page and i found out tat most of the gals are emotional, just like wat i always thought of. for an example, one of my female frien, she is very emotional and unpredictable. i used to hang around wif but its getting less and less. y? its all because shes too unpredictable. she will be laughing for the 1st 2 mins but she will be mad at someone in next 2 mins. see wat i mean? another 1, a couple of days ago, i was in my class and there was a female frien of mine. i was talking to her, but she suddenly bursted and started to offend me. i was like "wat the hell*%#^&" after the next 2 mins, she came back to herself and talked to me in a friendly way. but i didnt burst. try to imagine if some1 scolded without any reasons, and u r trying to hold it. tats a very hard thing to do, isnt it.

do u actually noe how to spell the word 'girl'? it is not a trick question. the answer is ' TROUBLE' hav u ever experince how pathetic they are? if u didnt. at least i did, they r like cancer. keep on growing bigger, bigger and bigger until the day u die... in fact, after ur death, they r still growing bigger, bigger and bigger. interested in a story of mine? if u insist, i hav no choice but to tell u. it was a beautiful morning, and i was at my girl's place. we talked and fooled around for a couple of hours. then, suddenly both of us stopped, halted and looked deep into each other's eyes. we kissed pasionately until i threw her on her bed. i started to make love... then, when i almost came, i heard someone calling my name. then i opened my eyes, i saw my gal sitting beside me. y the fuck did she call me up??!! i almost came. see wat i mean? gal r nth but trouble. comments from reader: billy the carpenter: this sucks maxwell the porn star: well, it was pretty good.......down to pathetic sabrina the sexy: how dare u insult gals, i gonna tell my mama cornelius the nerd: sorry but i dont understand wat does 'make love' mean? from the authour: thx guys for reading. i noe it was really boring. but tat was my purpose to waste ur time, told u not to read. and u wont listen.
